title: 6 Bobbins For Making Lace, 18th–19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. H. Judkins
description: Turned, decorated in color, and weighted with jingles of glass beads. The bobbins have the following words in colored dots: a) Betsy, b) Betty, c) Will, d) Frederic, e) Marry Me Quick, f) Joseh

tombstone.epitaph:
6 Bobbins For Making Lace, 18th–19th century.
18th–19th century. Bone, glass. Gift of Mrs. C. H. Judkins. 1939-63-1-a/f.
